oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Children: Writing
Education
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Punishment of writing repeated sentences. The original page, a very large page, was folded into four parts; the bottom-left one is now missing. The two top parts contain the same sentence repeated; the bottom-right contains repetitions of a different sentence. The top-right part of the page seems to have been torn or folded.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Writing exercise
